committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require that retired Army and Air Force reserve enlisted personnel be advanced in grade after 30 years of service to the highest grade satisfactorily held while on active duty.

summary.text: Amends Federal armed forces provisions to require that retired Army and Air Force reserve enlisted personnel be advanced in grade after 30 years of service to the highest grade satisfactorily held while on active duty.
